Description.Text:
Position The hotel is situated in a quiet residential area of Milano Marittima, at 50 m from the beach.
Restaurant Air-conditioned Restaurant.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations The hotel was partially refurbished in 2000 and in 2013 the rooms were refurbished.
Breakfast: Sweet and salty buffet. During meals: choice between 3 menus, accompanied by a mixed buffet, fruit or dessert.
FACILITIES: Swimming pool open from 07/06/14 to 05/09/14 ( Opening hours: 09.00am – 12.00 (midday) and from 04.00pm to 07.00pm).
Activity for adults: aperitiv at sunday from 01/06/14 to 01/09/14.
DEPOSIT: The guests at them arrival in Hotel will pay € 50.00 per room per stay as a deposit.
RECEPTION: Opened from 08.00 am to 09.00 pm.
ARRIVAL AND DEPARTURE: Check in from 12.00 (midday) / Check out at 10.00 am.
